steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor at the position where you want to insert the subscript character.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Symbols' button in the 'Symbols' group.
From the drop-down menu, select 'More Symbols'.
In the 'Symbol' dialog box, make sure the 'Symbols' tab is selected.
Scroll through the list of symbols and find the subscript character you want to insert.
Click on the subscript character to select it.
Click on the 'Insert' button to insert the selected subscript character into your document.
Verify that the subscript character has been inserted at the desired position in your document.
